des:
Enjoy your spaces with the best experience in lighting, security, monitoring and automation — now controlled by your voice.
"Tecnolite Connect" skill for Alexa will help you control your lights, switches, plugs and thermostats. Create your own scenes and live the experience of a smarter home.
Take complete control! And dare to live the Tecnolite Connect experience.

(1) Download our "Tecnolite Connect" app in android or ios app market;
(2) Register one Tecnolite Connect account in our "Tecnolite Connect" app;
(3) You need to have some Tecnolite Connect devices in hand;
(4) Configure these devices in our “Tecnolite Connect” app and change appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "Tecnolite Connect" skills;
(5) Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android, ios or Amazon app market;
(6) To integrate the "Tecnolite Connect" skill, go to the Alexa mobile app. In the "Skills" section, search for and select "Tecnolite Connect". Finally, select "ENABLE".
(7) The login screen will appear on the Tecnolite Connect portal. This way you can connect your account with Alexa.
(8) Next, select the devices you want to control with Alexa. You can assign a custom name to each of them (eg, Room Light, Front Door, Main Room Thermostat, etc).
(9) Finally, select "Done" and then "DISCOVER DEVICES" or tell Alexa the phrase "Discover devices." This can take up to 45 seconds.
Start living smarter with Tecnolite Connect !

“Alexa, turn on kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off kitchen light"
“Alexa, dim livingroom light"
“Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
“Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, set bedroom light to Blue"
“Alexa, turn on switch"
“Alexa, turn off switch"
“Alexa, turn on thermostat"
“Alexa, turn off thermostat"
